creator: tjsb@slb.com
text:
The property function allows the user to retrieve the value of a system or 
JMeter property.

If the property does not exist, the function currently returns the property 
name, which is not all that useful.

In order to be backwards compatible with existing scripts, amend the function 
to accept a 3rd (optional) parameter: the default value.

To allow the function to be used without storing the value in a variable, the 
2nd parameter can be set to the empty string.
